Changelog
=========

0.3.2 - (2009-06-22)

 - API update. [malthe]

0.3.1 - (2009-03-18)

 - Updated configuration. [seletz]

0.3 - (2008-12-03)

 - Renamed package to ``repoze.bfg.htmlpage``. [malthe]

0.2 - (2008-11-13)

 - Added skin template API to acquire layout by name. [malthe]

0.1 - (2008-10-03)

 - Raise exceptions that are more meaningful. [malthe]

 - Renamed package to ``repoze.bfg.layouts``. [seletz]
